questiontext.text:
power.html

  1. <!DOCTYPE html>
  2. <{3:SAC:=html}>
  3. <{3:SAC:=head}>
  4. <meta charset="utf-8" />
  5. <{3:SAC:=title}>Power<{3:SAC:=/title}>
  6. <{3:SAC:=/head}>
  7. <{3:SAC:=body}>
  8. <{3:SAC:=h1}>Power<{3:SAC:=/h1}>
  9. <{5:SAC:=form} {5:SAC:=action}="power.php" method="{5:SAC:=post}">
  10. <p>Voltage: <{5:SAC:=input} {5:SAC:=type}="{6:SAC:=number}" {5:SAC:=name}="{8:SAC:=voltage}" {5:SAC:=step}="0.1" /> V</p>
  11. <p>Current: <{5:SAC:=input} {5:SAC:=type}="{6:SAC:=number}" {5:SAC:=name}="{8:SAC:=current}" {5:SAC:=step}="0.1" />
  12. <{5:SAC:=input} {5:SAC:=id}="A" {5:SAC:=type}="{6:SAC:=radio}" {5:SAC:=name}="{8:SAC:=unit}" value="A" checked="{3:SAC:=checked}" />
  13. <label {5:SAC:=for}="A" />A</label>
  14. <{5:SAC:=input} {5:SAC:=id}="mA" {5:SAC:=type}="{6:SAC:=radio}" {5:SAC:=name}="{8:SAC:=unit}" value="mA" />
  15. <label {5:SAC:=for}="mA" />mA</label>
  16. </p>
  17. <p><{5:SAC:=input} {5:SAC:=type}="{5:SAC:=submit}" value="Power" /></p>
  18. </{5:SAC:=form}>
  19. <{3:SAC:=/body}>
  20. <{3:SAC:=/html}>
